title: Topic 001 Question 971
body: A company has an environment that includes Amazon EC2 instances, Amazon Lightsail, and on-premises servers. The company wants to automate the security updates for its operating systems and applications.
Which solution will meet these requirements with the LEAST operational effort?
options: Use AWS Shield to identify and manage security events.
Connect to each server by using a remote desktop connection. Run an update script.
Use the AWS Systems Manager Patch Manager capability.
Schedule Amazon GuardDuty to run on a nightly basis.
